Commentary.ab: Y20.3a yat̰] sec. cod. Ir.; Geldner, Kellens yat̰. OAv. form hiiat̰ expected. Only cod. 672, 677, 4515 hiiat̰.
Y20.3a.8 vīspəm mąϑrəm vīspəm mąϑrāi] vīspāi mąϑrāi expected. Cod. 2040 vīspəm vīspāi mąϑrāi (mąϑrəm missing), 4370 vīspəm mąϑrəm vīspāi mąϑrāi. Likely secondary corrections of 19th Century.

Y20.3d šaōš́iieṇtibiiō] irr. sec. cod. 2007, 2010, 2109, 4040, 5020 (°-aṇtibiiō 5,15,83,88, 231, 400, 410, 2106); Geldner saošiiaṇtaēbiiō; Kellens saošiiaṇtibiiō. Only attested form for the dat. pl. of saōš́iiaṇt-. Cf. t̰bišiiaṇbiiō (Y68.13), other similar forms dat. pl. amauuat̰biiō (VrS24.7) and druuat̰biiō (Y57.36), instr. pl. daēuuauuat̰bīš and yatumat̰bīš (Y12.9), and bərəzaṇbiia (e.g. Y1.11) with full degree. For vv. ll. vid. Apparatus.
